queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc/machine-id' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/machine-id' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/fluent-bit' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/fluent-bit' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/log' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/log' mounted

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/log' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/log' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/var/fluent-bit' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/var/fluent-bit' with hostPath

files.expected_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' should not mount a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/machine-id' with hostPath
files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-fluent-bit-collector' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/etc/machine-id' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.securityContext.runAsUser is 0 and 'runAsNonRoot' is false

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.resources.limits.memory is undefined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.resources.requests.memory is undefined

queries.query_name: Service Account Token Automount Not Disabled
queries.description: Service Account Tokens are automatically mounted even if not necessary

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.automountServiceAccountToken should be set to false
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.automountServiceAccountToken is true

queries.description: Namespaces like 'default', 'kube-system' or 'kube-public' should not be used

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

files.expected_value: 'metadata.namespace' should not be set to default, kube-system or kube-public
files.actual_value: 'metadata.namespace' is set to default

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=collector has resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=collector doesn't have resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=collector should have resources defined
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=collector doesn't have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.imagePullPolicy should be set to 'Always'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{collector}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{collector}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{collector}}

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-fluent-bit-collector}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
